name: QuirkyCountwithvariableintervalupto3seconds
0:
”Alexa, ask quirky count to count number from two to eleven”
”Alexa, ask quirky count to count to ten with interval of one second”
”Alexa, ask quirky count to initiate counting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quirky count
des:
How Many Times you wanted alexa to count upto ten with a certain interval in mind? By default alexa counts without any breaks!
Let's say you wanted to practice deep breaths for count of 10 with pause of 1 second.
With Quirky count you can do exactly this and much more.

In this skill one can ask Alexa to count from one number to another number.
For example you can say count number from 3 to 30. Or count upto ten.
We currently support 4 modes
1. No delay --- Can be invoked by simply asking quirky count to count upto a certain number
2. 1 second --- Can be invoked by asking quirky count to count upto certain number with an interval of 1 or 1 second
3. 2 second --- Can be invoked by asking quirky count to count upto certain number with an interval of 2 or 2 second
4. 3 second --- Can be invoked by asking quirky count to count upto certain number with an interval of 3 or 3 second

Sample Utterances:
1. Count from 2 to 10 with interval of 1 second
2. Count to 5 with interval of 1 second
3. Count number from 2 to 10


You can reach out to me on tathagata [at] tathagatamitra [dot] com for any feedback
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
